gear_list.Name: L-acoustics KARA
gear_list.Comment: Main system. Line source element has an operating frequency bandwidth from 55 Hz to 20 kHz

gear_list.Name: L-acoustics KIWA II
gear_list.Comment: Additional system - front field. Operates from 70 Hz to 20 kHz. 100° symmetric horizontal directivity

gear_list.Name: L-acoustics LA8
gear_list.Comment: 4-channel amplifier. Universal switched mode power supply, 120 / 230 V (or 100 / 200 V for Japan) 4x1100W/8Ωat1%THD,allchannelsdriven (4 x 1300 W peak); 4 x 1800 W/4 or 2.7 Ω at 1% THD, all channels driven (4 x 2500 W peak)

gear_list.Name: L-Acoustics LA4X
gear_list.Comment: Cutting edge loudspeaker amplification, DSP, network; High-grade 24 bit A/D converters, 130 dB dynamic range; 32 bit floating point SHARC DSP, 96 kHz sampling rate; 4 channel high efficiency amplifier section fed by 2 inputs; 4 X 1000W/4 Ohms

gear_list.Name: Speacon
gear_list.Comment: Switching kit for KARA and KIWA II

gear_list.Name: Power socket
gear_list.Comment: The single protective contact sockets 7/7 Schuco
